content:
Hello all! I'm a software engineer/competitive programmer who recently discovered Lean, and honestly this is one of the coolest projects I've seen!

After getting some exposure to type theory through Agda and HoTT, I've been constantly thinking about how awesome it would be to have a general-purpose programming language with a proof-enabling type system (especially for some challenging competitive programming problems), so seeing that this exists is very exciting!

I'm excited to learn more about Lean, as well as watching as how it grows and evolves over time!
